name: ACE-1719
desc: The ACE-1719 is a pro-grade electronic drum with powerful sound, sturdy build, and upgraded pads. Featuring an 8” splash, 12” hi-hat, 16” ride, and 12” Kevlar kick, it’s perfect for studios and live shows.

features.name: Powerful Sound System
points: ACE-7102 Module: The latest sound module with built-in Bluetooth for easy wireless connection.
553 Sounds, 30+50 Drum Kits: A variety of sounds for any style, perfect for recording and live shows.
Enhanced Sampling: Multi-layered sampling captures left and right-hand dynamics, preserving snare resonance and simulating real drum acoustics for a lifelike feel.

features.name: Heavy-duty Rack System
features.desc: Powerful heavy-duty Rack System, quick adjustment to any angle.

features.name: 12’’ 2 pieces independent Hihat
features.desc: Dual-plate design for authentic playing. Offers natural rebound and realistic swing, mimicking acoustic hi-hats. Supports traditional techniques perfectly.

features.name: Natural Feel with Upgraded Acoustic Pads
points: Upgraded Pads: More acoustically designed pads with a larger striking surface.
Three-Zone Snare: Detects Head, Rim, and Rimshot hits, adding depth and variety to your performance.
Dual-Zone Toms: Supports Head and Rim strikes for a more responsive, dynamic feel.
Adjustable Tension Mesh: Dual-layer mesh gives a realistic rebound and allows tension adjustments to suit your playing style.

features.name: Upgraded 16’’ Three-Zone Silicone Ride Cymbal
points: The upgraded CSF-16-SL Ride Cymbal has a more extensive beating zone.
Edge and Bow Bell Sensing: Detects hits on both the edge, bow, and bell, giving you more expressive control.
Choke Feature: Allows manual muting for added expression.
Premium Silicone: Feels natural and responds accurately to dynamic changes for smooth, authentic play.

features.name: Accurate Multi-Sensor Technology
features.desc: A multi-sensor technique precisely captures each hit, from gentle taps to hard strikes, giving you realistic dynamic feedback to elevate your performance.

features.name: Upgraded 12’’ Durable Kevlar Kick Drum
points: The new BD-12-KL kick drum has a more extensive beating zone and supports a double pedal.

Made from tough Kevlar, the kick drum passed a 22,000,000-hit endurance test without damage, ensuring it stays reliable even under intense use. Enjoy solid feedback for a genuine, lasting playing experience.

features.name: Easy MIDI and USB Connections
features.desc: MIDI and USB support: A Simple USB cable sends audio and MIDI data straight to your music software, making ACE-320 an excellent choice for home studios and live performances.

widgets.name: Kick Pad
widgets.desc: BD-12-KL x1 (12-inch) Kevlar Fiber with multi-layer cushion

widgets.name: Crash Cymbal 1
widgets.desc: CSF-14-SL x1(14-inch) Silicone 2-zone pad with choke

widgets.name: Crash Cymbal 2
widgets.desc: CSF-14-SL x1(14-inch) Silicone 2-zone pad with choke

widgets.name: Ride Cymbal
widgets.desc: CSF-16-SL x1(16-inch) Silicone 3-zone pad with choke
